tasks.title: Boardroom anti-groupthink: independent initialization + selective history
tasks.description: Restructure runBoardroom into phases based on research findings: Phase 1 (rounds 1): Independent thinking -- each agent sees only topic + whiteboard, no chat history. Forms position independently. Phase 2 (rounds 2-3): Selective sharing -- agents see whiteboard + own prior messages + compressed summary of others' positions. NOT full transcript. Phase 3 (rounds 4+): Convergence -- synthesis round, flag disagreements as valuable. This prevents anchoring bias (r=0.902 sycophancy correlation), groupthink (80%+ collapse), and produces more diverse outputs (research: embedding similarity 0.791 -> 0.511 without shared context).
